special_events.description: You are shown into a cramped office. {harbormaster_name} eyes your crew, counting quietly. "Fees are due if you want to berth in {current_port}. Storm season makes space tight."

1.text: Pay the standard fee ({harbor_fee} gold) and request berthing.

2.text: Offer a small gift of spices to soften the fee.

3.text: Refuse and return to anchorage to think.

Portuguese Conquistador.description: {harbormaster_name} lingers on the banner at your stern. "We mind powder and pride here, Captain."

2.text: Hint at martial protection for reduced fees.

Arab Muslim Dāʿī.description: {harbormaster_name} nods at your greeting. "Peace upon you. Traders and callers alike find room—if ledger and conscience agree."

2.text: Invoke pious hospitality and offer a token gift.

Chinese Trader.description: {harbormaster_name} weighs your account books with interest. "Paper straight, cargo sealed, fee proper."

2.text: Present neat manifests to negotiate a merchant’s rate.

harbor_events.description: You dock at a bustling harbor. Merchants call out, offering exotic goods for trade.

1.text: Trade some of your goods for spices.

2.text: Sell some of your spices for gold.

3.text: Ignore the merchants and set sail.

harbor_events.description: The harbor master offers to repair your ship for a fee.

2.text: Decline repairs and save your gold.

village_events.description: A village festival is underway. Music, dancing, and food fill the air.

2.text: Trade goods at the festival market.

village_events.description: Villagers ask for help repairing their fishing boats.

sea_events.description: Dark clouds gather. A storm batters your ship.

1.text: Order the crew to secure the sails.

2.text: Attempt to ride out the storm.

sea_events.description: Two crew members are fighting over stolen rations.

1.text: Break up the fight and mediate.
